name: Welcome to 808
description:
This game was made for the Dream Arcade Archive Jam, where the challenge was to create a game with arcade features that deals with a topic and/or mechanics you wouldn't find in a classic arcade machine.

So, I tried to make a game about the emotional barriers we put up around us to protect ourselves (but that can end up causing us to miss out on so many good things).

❤I hope you like it❤

Arrows/Joystick to move

Space bar/ Y to activate barrier
